mapper.update: update userInfo set isValid=true where id=#{id}
update userInfo set lastDate=CURDATE() where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select id, nickname, name, address2, git, lastDate, state, responsibility, isValid,leaveUser,intro from userInfo where address2 like CONCAT('%',#{sido},'%') and address2 like CONCAT('%',#{gugun},'%') and address2 like CONCAT('%',#{dong},'%') and state = 1

select a.* from( select b.*, a.projects from( SELECT jointwo.userId, GROUP_CONCAT(jointwo.pjt) AS projects FROM ( select concat(joinone.pid,';',joinone.pjtName) as pjt,joinone.userId from( select project.pid, project.pjtName, pmember.userId from pmember join project on project.pid = pmember.pid )as joinone ) as jointwo group by jointwo.userId ) as a right join ( select * from( select userInfo.id,userInfo.nickname, userInfo.address2 ,userInfo.git ,userInfo.lastDate ,userInfo.state ,userInfo.responsibility ,userInfo.isValid ,userInfo.leaveUser ,userInfo.intro ,a.interests from userInfo left join( SELECT id, GROUP_CONCAT(interest) AS interests FROM interest group by id ) as a on userInfo.id = a.id ) as b ) as b on a.userId = b.id where b.leaveUser != 1 and b.id != 'admin' and b.state = true ) as a where a.id in ( select id from userInfo where address2 like CONCAT('%',#{sido},'%') and address2 like CONCAT('%',#{gugun},'%') and address2 like CONCAT('%',#{dong},'%') and state = 1 and id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select a.* from( select b.*, a.projects from( SELECT jointwo.userId, GROUP_CONCAT(jointwo.pjt) AS projects FROM ( select concat(joinone.pid,';',joinone.pjtName) as pjt,joinone.userId from( select project.pid, project.pjtName, pmember.userId from pmember join project on project.pid = pmember.pid )as joinone ) as jointwo group by jointwo.userId ) as a right join ( select * from( select userInfo.id,userInfo.nickname, userInfo.address2 ,userInfo.git ,userInfo.lastDate ,userInfo.state ,userInfo.responsibility ,userInfo.isValid ,userInfo.leaveUser ,userInfo.intro ,a.interests from userInfo left join( SELECT id, GROUP_CONCAT(interest) AS interests FROM interest group by id ) as a on userInfo.id = a.id ) as b ) as b on a.userId = b.id where b.leaveUser != 1 and b.id != 'admin' and b.state = true ) as a where a.id in ( select id from userInfo where address2 like CONCAT('%',#{sido},'%') and address2 like CONCAT('%',#{gugun},'%') and address2 like CONCAT('%',#{dong},'%') and state = 1 and id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and id in ( select id from ( select * from interest where interest in (#{tag1},#{tag2},#{tag3},#{tag4},#{tag5}) ) as b group by id having count(interest) >= #{cnt} ) )
select address1 from userInfo as ui left join pmember as p on ui.id = p.userId where p.pid = #{pid};
